name: Death is always the beginning (Web Version)
name_original: Death is always the beginning (Web Version)
description:
This is the web version of the game with the same title , which you can find on my profile.

This game was  made for the Game Jam for GameDev.tv 2022. I got all the assets for free on the Unity Asset Store, I do not own any of the assets in this game. 

Feel free to check out the version for Mac .
